subject: Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
lead_paragraph: Dale Petroskey resigned as president of the baseball Hall of Fame on Tuesday after its board’s executive committee found he “failed to exercise proper fiduciary responsibility.” The Hall’s executive committee said it found there were “other business judgments that were not in the best interest of the National Baseball Hall of Fame and Museum.”.
